Posts.EditableText: How would I go about overriding the "look at self" command?  If I add a description to the "player" object, it doesn't seem to change the default "Looking good!" response.
Posts.HTML: How would I go about overriding the "look at self" command?  If I add a description to the "player" object, it doesn't seem to change the default "Looking good!" response.

Posts.EditableText: There is a space for setting it on the player object Options tab, which is designed to override. Not sure what version that was implemented in.
Posts.HTML: There is a space for setting it on the player object Options tab, which is designed to override. Not sure what version that was implemented in.

Oh. Wow.

There it is. I just had to scroll down.
